Package org.relayirc.swingutil.propsheet.editors

Class Summary
BooleanEditor PropertyEditor that provides custom editor for editing an integer.
ComboEditor PropertyEditor that provides custom editor for editing a string value by selecting from a list of possible values.
IntegerEditor PropertyEditor that provides custom editor for editing an integer.
LabelEditor PropertyEditor that provides custom editor for a read-only string value.
PasswordEditor TODO: PropertyEditor that provides custom editor for editing a password.
TextEditor PropertyEditor that provides custom editor for editing a string value.
TriggeredEditor Label wih a trigger button.
TriggeredListEditor Editor wih a trigger button that launches a simple list editor dialog.
TriggeredListSelectionEditor Editor wih a trigger button that launches a simple list selection dialog.
TriggeredTextEditor Editor wih a trigger button that launches a simple text editor dialog.
